caption: nm4.in
message:
Spoke at length about #Rio2016, India’s performance & the way ahead during today’s #MannKiBaat . 

Felt proud of the youngsters in Chhattisgarh & Karnataka who prevailed upon their elders & ensured toilet construction in their local areas. Shared a remarkable story of an octogenarian retired teacher who contributed Rs. 50,000 so that other women get access to a gas connection. https://soundcloud.com/narendramodi/pm-modis-mann-ki-baat-august-2016
